==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ひだり|ひらめ|みぎ|かれい|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
Literally, "left [is] olive flounder, right [is] righteye flounder."

===Idiom===
{{ja-pos|ひだり ひらめ みぎ かれい|idiom}}

# The way to distinguish an olive flounder from a righteye flounder. {{ja-r|鮃|ひらめ|gloss=olive flounder}} can be distinguished from {{ja-r|鰈|かれい|gloss=righteye flounder}} by noting that the eyes of the former are on the left and the eyes of the latter are on the right.
